actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to relocate the water supply intake facility at Springfield, South Dakota.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to relocate the water supply intake facility on the Missouri River at Springfield, South Dakota, which is subject to severe sedimentation, to a site approximately two miles downstream at an estimated cost of $1,250,000, which shall be paid by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to relocate the water supply intake facility at Springfield, South Dakota.
